str2: And he, she, it, and that. From kai and ekeinos; likewise that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to look closely at, i.e. perceive; by extension to visit.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To be unfaithful, disbelieve, refuse belief, prove false. From apistos; to be unbelieving, i.e. disbelieve, or disobey.
